channel.title: Syllabus :: K-State CIS 580 Textbook
channel.description: Web Only This textbook was authored for the CIS 580 - Fundamentals of Game Programming course at Kansas State University. This front matter is specific to that course. If you are not enrolled in the course, please disregard this section. CIS 580 - Fundamentals of Game Programming Previous Versions Instructor Contact Information Instructor: Nathan Bean (nhbean AT ksu DOT edu) Office: DUE 2216 Phone: (785)483-9264 (Call/Text) Website: https://nathanhbean.com Office Hours: WU 1:00-2:00 or by appointment Preferred Methods of Communication: Chat:Â Quick questions via Ed Discussions are the preferred means of communication.
